title: How to Make Barbecued Chicken Lettuce Wraps

steps.headline: Gather the ingredients that you will need.
Make the glaze - Put a saucepan over medium heat and combine the soy sauce, orange juice, garlic and brown sugar into the pan.
steps.description: Bring the mixture to a boil and leave it to reduce the quantity by half, which takes about five minutes and then take the pan off the heat.

steps.headline: Cook the chives - Fill a saucepan halfway full of water and bring it to boil.
steps.description: After the water is boiling add the chives, give them a little stir and cook for one minute. After removing the chives put them into a bowl of iced water for 20 seconds.

steps.headline: Barbecue the chicken - Brush one side of the chicken with the glaze and put it on the grill.
steps.description: Continue glazing and turning the chicken until it is cooked.

steps.headline: Cut the chicken - Slice both pieces of chicken in half, lengthwise and set aside.
Make the wraps - Put one slice of chicken, a few carrots, a little coriander, basil and mint on top of a piece of lettuce and roll the wrap up.
Serve your wraps - Place your wraps on serving dishes and drizzle glaze onto the top of the wraps.

Continue glazing and turning the chicken until it is cooked. Cut the chicken - Slice both pieces of chicken in half, lengthwise and set aside.  Make the wraps - Put one slice of chicken, a few carrots, a little coriander, basil and mint on top of a piece of lettuce and roll the wrap up.  Serve your wraps - Place your wraps on serving dishes and drizzle glaze onto the top of the wraps.  Finished.
